title: 武漢有美國人死於武漢肺炎

replies.msg:
An American citizen has died in Wuhan from the coronavirus outbreak, the New York Times reported.
The person who was around 60 years old died on Thursday, the paper said, citing a U.S. embassy statement. A Japanese man who was suspected of contracting the virus has also died in Wuhan, Japan’s foreign ministry said Saturday.


Source: https://www.bloomberg.com/news/articles/2020-02-07/coronavirus-death-toll-climbs-near-total-from-sars-virus-update?cmpid=socialflow-twitter-business&utm_source=twitter&utm_medium=social&utm_campaign=socialflow-organic&utm_content=business
